RangeSet - Class in gui
Class stores a set of ranges, i.e., intervals.
RangeSet() - Constructor for class gui.RangeSet
Constructor
RangeSet.Interval - Class in gui
Internal class to hold a pair of two elements to represent an interval of values on the x-axis.
RangeSetTest - Class in gui
The RangeSet class is used to represent a starting interval [lb,ub] that is subsequently split into a set of smaller intervals but looking for intersections with other intervals [a,b] and removing such intervals.
RangeSetTest() - Constructor for class gui.RangeSetTest
 
rbranch - Variable in class generation.BSPBranch
 
readBSPNode(Element) - Method in class gui.MazeFileReader
Reads data for a BSPNode from file for the given element The method recursively explores the left and right branches and builds a complete tree.

robot - Variable in class gui.Controller
The robot that interacts with the controller starting from P3
Robot - Interface in gui
This interface specifies methods to operate a robot that is inside a maze at a particular location and looking in a particular direction.
Robot.Direction - Enum in gui
Describes all possible directions from the point of view of the robot, i.e., relative to its current forward position.
Robot.Turn - Enum in gui
Describes all possible turns that a robot can do when it rotates on the spot.
RobotDriver - Interface in gui
This interface specifies a robot driver that operates a robot to escape from a given maze.

rotateClockwise() - Method in enum generation.CardinalDirection
Gives the direction that results from a 90 degree clockwise rotation applied to the current direction.
rSet - Variable in class gui.FirstPersonView
If one focuses on the x-axis for the first person view and looks at the center line (the horizon), one recognizes that for any [x,x+1] interval, there is either an opening for the special case of the exit or exactly 1 wall shown.
run() - Method in class generation.MazeBuilder
